thread.title: Sonu Sood and Jackie Chan's 'Kung Fu Yoga' gets a 'Fast & Furious' twist | Deccan Chronicle
thread.title_full: Sonu Sood and Jackie Chan's 'Kung Fu Yoga' gets a 'Fast & Furious' twist | Deccan Chronicle

author: karen.p
title: Sonu Sood and Jackie Chan's 'Kung Fu Yoga' gets a 'Fast & Furious' twist | Deccan Chronicle
text: karen.p | October 20, 2015, 17.44 pm Mumbai: Martial arts superstar Jackie Chan is busy shooting his upcoming action flick ‘Kungfu Yoga’ with our Bollywood star Sonu Sood. The cast and crew have taken their shoot outdoor to the busy streets of Dubai. A new set of pictures from the sets revel that the action flick will also have a ‘Fast and Furious’ undertone to it, with thrilling car chase scenes. An online report confirms that innumerable takes and retakes were shot of a three-car chase scene, with Bugatti and Lamborghini police cars chased after a McLaren with the Burj Khalifa as its backdrop. facebook_posts1 When the cameras stop rolling, both Jackie and Sonu have been spotted spending their free time with a baby named Aliza on the sets. The bulky action stars photographed playing and tickling the kid, who is an Instagram sensation. Sonu also tweeted out a picture of the new ‘friends’ he made on the sets. The actor shared a picture of a tiger cub and was spotted letting an eagle fly loose during one of their desert tours. facebook_posts2 Directed by Stanley Tong, the film that also stars Ileana D’Cruz will release next year. Tags: entertainment Bollywood Sonu Sood Jackie Chan Kung Fu Yoga Also Read Watch: Sonam Kapoor lets herself loose in 'Phatte tak nachna' Anurag’s heavily banking on Bombay Velvet Phoren voice on desi mic Ben Affleck's 'Gone Girl' release in India shifted to October 31
